summary: This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration Form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, filed in January 2017. It certifies the official receipt and maintenance of his registration details, including his addresses, vehicles, passport, and internet identifiers, as part of his legal obligations as a registered sexual offender in Florida. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration Form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, signed on January 5, 2017. It details his registration requirements as a sexual offender, including his personal information, addresses, and travel restrictions. The document is certified as a true copy by an FDLE records custodian in January 2019. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form and accompanying certification, detailing the legal obligations of Jeffrey E. Epstein as a registered sexual offender. It includes his registration details, addresses, and a certification from a records custodian verifying the documents for legal proceedings in 2019. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration Form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated June 29, 2016. It details his registration obligations, personal information, vehicles, and addresses, including his permanent residence in the U.S. Virgin Islands and a temporary address in Palm Beach, Florida. The document is certified by a records custodian in January 2019. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated January 19, 2016. It details his registration obligations, personal information, vehicles, and contact details as a registered sex offender in Florida, and includes a certification of the documents from January 2019. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated June 26, 2015. It details his registration obligations as a sexual offender, including his personal information, addresses, vehicles, and travel plans. The document is certified as a true copy in January 2019. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated January 20, 2015, and a certification of its authenticity from 2019. It details his legal obligations as a registered sexual offender, including his registration number, personal details, addresses, vehicles, and a notice of his required re-registration schedule. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form and certification for Jeffrey E. Epstein. It details his legal obligations as a registered sex offender in Florida, including his registration details, addresses, and employment as of 2014-2015. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated June 27, 2014. It details his registration information, addresses, vehicles, vessels, and email accounts, and includes a certification of the documents from January 2019. The form outlines the legal obligations of a registered sexual offender in Florida. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, signed on December 30, 2013. It details his registration obligations as a sexual offender, including his addresses, vehicles, and online accounts, and includes a certification from a records custodian dated January 14, 2019, verifying the authenticity of the records. This document contains certified copies of Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration forms for Jeffrey E. Epstein, filed in July 2012 and January 2013. It details his registration obligations, personal information, addresses, vehicles, and email accounts as a registered sexual offender in Florida. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated January 2012. It details his registration information, including multiple residences (NY, NM, Paris), vehicles, vessels, email addresses, and his obligations as a registered sex offender. A certification page from 2019 confirms the document's authenticity. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration Form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated July 2011, with a certification from 2019. It details his registration obligations, personal information, addresses, vehicles, and electronic communication accounts as a registered sexual offender in Florida. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, filed in January 2011. It details his registration obligations, personal information, addresses, vehicles, vessels, and email accounts as a registered sexual offender in Florida. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration Form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, filed in July 2010. It details his registration obligations, personal information, addresses, vehicles, and email accounts as a registered sexual offender in Florida, following his conviction. This document is a Florida Department of Law Enforcement (FDLE) Sexual Predator/Offender Registration Form for Jeffrey E. Epstein, dated July 19, 2010. It details his registration information, addresses, vehicles, employment, and the legal obligations he must follow as a registered sexual offender. The document is certified by a records custodian in 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey E. Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the registration form, required to comply with Florida's sexual offender laws. He provides his personal information, addresses, employment, vehicles, and online accounts.

persons.name: Richard L. Swearingen
persons.role: Commissioner, Florida Department of Law Enforcement
persons.context: Commissioner of the FDLE, whose name appears on the department's letterhead for the certification documents.

persons.context: Commissioner of Agriculture of Florida, listed on the FDLE letterhead for the certification documents dated 2019.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is officially registered as a sexual offender in Florida, with the registration dated January 5, 2017.

Epstein listed multiple addresses, including a permanent address in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands (6100 Red Hook Quarters), a temporary address in Palm Beach, Florida (358 El Brillo Way), and a mailing address in New York City (9 E 71st St).
The document records Epstein's passport number (C1341578), issued on October 11, 2016, and expiring October 10, 2024.
Epstein reported email identifiers including 'jeffrey.epstein@yahoo.com' and 'jeffreyepstein@yahoo.com' as part of his internet registration obligations.
The form indicates Epstein was unemployed at the time of registration but listed a previous employer as 'Financial Trust Company' at his St. Thomas address.
Jeffrey Epstein was registered as a sexual offender in Florida, required to report twice a year (in January and July) for life.
Epstein listed multiple addresses, including a primary residence in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands, a temporary address in Palm Beach, Florida, and a mailing address in New York City.
The registration form lists Epstein's employer as 'Financial Trust Company' at his St. Thomas address, with a start date of July 26, 2012.
Failure to comply with any of the numerous reporting requirements listed on the form constituted a felony offense.
The document was officially certified as a true copy by the Florida Department of Law Enforcement in January 2019 for legal proceedings.
Jeffrey Epstein was a registered sexual offender in Florida, required to comply with extensive reporting obligations including addresses, vehicles, and internet identifiers.
Epstein listed multiple addresses including residences in St. Thomas (U.S. Virgin Islands), Palm Beach, Florida, and New York City.
The document was officially certified by the Florida Department of Law Enforcement in January 2019, indicating its use in subsequent legal proceedings.
Epstein's registration number was 859077 and his person number was 73274 within the Florida system.
The form details the severe felony penalties for non-compliance with any of the registration requirements.
Jeffrey Epstein is registered as a sexual offender in Florida, with a registration number of 859077/811325 and person number 73274.

Epstein's listed permanent address is in the U.S. Virgin Islands (Little St. James), and he reports a temporary address in Palm Beach, Florida, and a phone number associated with a New York City address.
The document lists vehicles and a vessel registered to Epstein, including a 2013 Ford Expedition and a 2012 Cadillac.
Epstein reports email addresses: columbodental16@yahoo.com and iereprotec@yahoo.com.
The form is a standardized legal document outlining extensive and lifelong reporting obligations for sexual offenders in Florida, with failure to comply constituting felonies.
Jeffrey Epstein was a registered sex offender in Florida as of January 2016, required to report his addresses, vehicles, and internet identifiers.
Epstein listed multiple residences, including a permanent address in St. Thomas, U.S. Virgin Islands, a temporary address in Palm Beach, Florida, and a mailing address in New York City.

Epstein provided email addresses including 'ccrumbeadental1@yahoo.com' and 'jeeproject@yahoo.com' as part of his required internet identifier reporting.
The form was certified as an official record by the Florida Department of Law Enforcement in January 2019, indicating its use in ongoing legal proceedings.
